## TextBufferCreationParameters.storeStyles property

If `true`<!-- -->, both the \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] and \[\[TextLayoutStyle\]\] used to generate the \[\[TextBufferObject\]\] will be stored in it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
storeStyles?: boolean;
```
